fields.name: White Ape Leather
fields.desc: This armor was made from the remains of a White Ape (see Tome of Beasts) that fell in battle. While wearing this armor, you gain a +2 bonus to AC. In addition, the armor has the following properties while you wear it.

fields.name: White Ape Hide
fields.desc: This armor was made from the remains of a White Ape (see Tome of Beasts) that fell in battle. While wearing this armor, you gain a +2 bonus to AC. In addition, the armor has the following properties while you wear it.
